の付録\\

\section{第10章(10.7)式の詳細}

(10.7)式を再掲すると
\begin{eqnarray*}
F^{P^{\sigma}} & = & \left[\begin{array}{llllllll}
\left.p_{G00}\right|_{G00} & \left.p_{G01}\right|_{G00} & \left.p_{G10}\right|_{G00} & \left.p_{G11}\right|_{G00} & \left.p_{B00}\right|_{G00} & \left.p_{B01}\right|_{G00} & \left.p_{B10}\right|_{G00} & \left.p_{B11}\right|_{G00}\\
\left.p_{G00}\right|_{G01} & \left.p_{G01}\right|_{G01} & \left.p_{G10}\right|_{G01} & \left.p_{G11}\right|_{G01} & \left.p_{B00}\right|_{G01} & \left.p_{B01}\right|_{G01} & \left.p_{B10}\right|_{G01} & \left.p_{B11}\right|_{G01}\\
\left.p_{G00}\right|_{G10} & \left.p_{G01}\right|_{G10} & \left.p_{G10}\right|_{G10} & \left.p_{G11}\right|_{G10} & \left.p_{B00}\right|_{G10} & \left.p_{B01}\right|_{G10} & \left.p_{B10}\right|_{G10} & \left.p_{B11}\right|_{G10}\\
\left.p_{G00}\right|_{G11} & \left.p_{G01}\right|_{G11} & \left.p_{G10}\right|_{G11} & \left.p_{G11}\right|_{G11} & \left.p_{B00}\right|_{G11} & \left.p_{B01}\right|_{G11} & \left.p_{B10}\right|_{G11} & \left.p_{B11}\right|_{G11}\\
\left.p_{G00}\right|_{B00} & \left.p_{G01}\right|_{B00} & \left.p_{G10}\right|_{B00} & \left.p_{G11}\right|_{B00} & \left.p_{B00}\right|_{B00} & \left.p_{B01}\right|_{B00} & \left.p_{B10}\right|_{B00} & \left.p_{B11}\right|_{B00}\\
\left.p_{G00}\right|_{B01} & \left.p_{G01}\right|_{B01} & \left.p_{G10}\right|_{B01} & \left.p_{G11}\right|_{B01} & \left.p_{B00}\right|_{B01} & \left.p_{B01}\right|_{B01} & \left.p_{B10}\right|_{B01} & \left.p_{B11}\right|_{B01}\\
\left.p_{G00}\right|_{B10} & \left.p_{G01}\right|_{B10} & \left.p_{G10}\right|_{B10} & \left.p_{G11}\right|_{B10} & \left.p_{B00}\right|_{B10} & \left.p_{B01}\right|_{B10} & \left.p_{B10}\right|_{B10} & \left.p_{B11}\right|_{B10}\\
\left.p_{G00}\right|_{B11} & \left.p_{G01}\right|_{B11} & \left.p_{G10}\right|_{B11} & \left.p_{G11}\right|_{B11} & \left.p_{B00}\right|_{B11} & \left.p_{B01}\right|_{B11} & \left.p_{B10}\right|_{B11} & \left.p_{B11}\right|_{B11}
\end{array}\right]\\
 & = & A\odot B\odot C
\end{eqnarray*}
この式は以下のように与えられる。
\[
F^{P^{\sigma}}=A\odot B\odot C
\]
ここで、行列$A,B,C$は以下で与えられる。

{\scriptsize
\begin{eqnarray*}
A & = & \left[\begin{array}{llllllll}
\left.p_{G}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{G}\\
\left.p_{G}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{G}\\
\left.p_{G}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{G}\\
\left.p_{G}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{G} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{G}\\
\left.p_{G}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{B}\\
\left.p_{G}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{B}\\
\left.p_{G}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{B}\\
\left.p_{G}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{G}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{B} & \left.p_{B}\right|_{B}
\end{array}\right]\\
B & = & \left[\begin{array}{cccccccc}
P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G00) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G00) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid G00) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid G00) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G00) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G00) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid G00) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid G00)\\
P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G01) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G01) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid G01) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid G01) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G01) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G01) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid G01) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid G01)\\
P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid G10) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid G10) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G10) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G10) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid G10) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid G10) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G10) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G10)\\
P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid G11) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid G11) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G11) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G11) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid G11) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid G11) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G11) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G11)\\
P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B00) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B00) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid B00) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid B00) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B00) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B00) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid B00) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid B00)\\
P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B01) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B0) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid B01) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid B01) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B01) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B01) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid B01) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid B01)\\
P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid B10) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid B10) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B10) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B10) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid B10) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid B10) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B10) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B10)\\
P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid B11) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid B11) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B11) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B11) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid B11) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid B11) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B11) & P_{1}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B11)
\end{array}\right]\\
C & = & \left[\begin{array}{cccccccc}
P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G00) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid G00) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G00) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid G00) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G00) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid G00) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G00) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid G00)\\
P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid G01) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G01) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid G01) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G01) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid G01) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G01) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid G01) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G01)\\
P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G10) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid G10) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G10) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid G10) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G10) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid G10) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G10) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid G10)\\
P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid G11) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G11) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid G11) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G11) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid G11) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G11) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid G11) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid G11)\\
P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B00) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid B00) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B00) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid B00) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B00) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid B00) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B00) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid B00)\\
P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid B01) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B01) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid B0) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B01) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid B01) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B01) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid B01) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B01)\\
P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B10) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid B10) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B10) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid B10) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B10) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid B10) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B10) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(1\mid B10)\\
P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid B11) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B11) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid B11) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B11) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid B11) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B11) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(-1\mid B11) & P_{2}{}^{\sigma}(0\mid B11)
\end{array}\right]
\end{eqnarray*}
}{\scriptsize\par}
